title: How China Influences Hollywood
itunes:title: How China Influences Hollywood
description:
Erich Schwartzel, Hollywood Reporter for the Wall Street Journal, discusses his book "Red Carpet: Hollywood, China, and the Global Battle for Cultural Supremacy."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
